cspId.title: Cspid
cspId.description: Unique identifier assigned to the csp by the registry.

brandId.title: Brandid
brandId.description: Unique identifier assigned to the brand.

displayName.title: Displayname
displayName.description: Display or marketing name of the brand.

ein.title: Ein
ein.description: (Required for Non-profit/private/public) Government assigned corporate tax ID. EIN is 9-digits in U.S. The only entity type which does not require an EIN is a Sole Proprietor.

phone.title: Phone
phone.description: Valid phone number in e.164 international format.

state.title: State
state.description: State. Must be 2 letters code for United States.

postalCode.title: Postalcode
postalCode.description: Postal codes. Use 5 digit zipcode for United States

country.title: Country
country.description: ISO2 2 characters country code. Example: US - United States

email.title: Email
email.description: Valid email address of brand support contact.

ipAddress.title: Ipaddress
ipAddress.description: IP address of the browser requesting to create brand identity.

altBusinessId.title: Altbusinessid
altBusinessId.description: Alternate business identifier such as DUNS, LEI, or GIIN

universalEin.title: Universalein
universalEin.description: Universal EIN of Brand, Read Only.
